explanatory.question: Why does [person_1] use the horse?
answer: The just made marshmallow is hot.

predictive.question: What will [person_1] do after reaching the house?
answer: [person_1] will ask the horse to stop.
[person_1] will put the fish into the snack box next to it.
[person_1] will put it into a container.
[person_1] will grind the roasted coffee beans in [person_1].
reason: Because that is her job according to her action.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if the car has something wrong?
answer: The horse will not make a loud noise.
The horse may have bad eye sights.
The horse will make a loud noise.
The horse may stop the car.
reason: Because without protective gear , rugby is a dangerous sport with the risk of hurting the others and oneself.
The kids can't do it well enough.
